items.title: Get started
items.text:
• You'll need a Plex account
  • Download Plex or use in the web

items.title: Donate
items.text: You can donate by going to https://donate.d4rk.co or by using Venmo. All donations go towards electrical costs or server hardware.

items.title: Requests
items.text: New content requests are handled through Plex's native Watchlist system. Simply add movies or tv shows to your Watchlist inside of Plex and they will be added to the system shortly thereafter.

items.title: Requirements
items.text: You need to have your Watchlist set to at least "Friends Only" and not "Private".
